name: Little Town (emilr)
description:
Take your pencils and start drawing your own little town! 

Little town offers you a magical pencil and notebook, that you can use to draw patterns, furniture … and even pets coming alive? Alongside your little friend, you start on an empty island, where you work on creative tasks and make money to get new instructions to further expand your own little comfort space!

With the core idea of object generation and drawing complex objects, this game offers unlimited possibilities and a foundation for creative exploration, learning to think in 3D and apply this knowledge in the process of object creation.

 Stay creative and enjoy!

If you love the game and want to see more in the future please feel free to leave a comment or donation 😍

Credits: Emil Reinert: Programming / Concept / 3D Art
